Purpose of Creation.quote: "For from him and through him and for him are all things." (Romans 11:36)

Divine Will.quote: "Thy will be done, on earth as it is in heaven." (Matthew 6:10)

Cosmic Plan.quote: "He has made everything beautiful in its time. He has also set eternity in the human heart." (Ecclesiastes 3:11)

Divine Direction.quote: "Allah guides whom He wills to a straight path." (Quran 2:213)

Sacred Purpose.quote: "The purpose of life is to realize the Self." (Ramana Maharshi)

Divine Guidance.quote: "I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go." (Psalm 32:8)

Universal Order.quote: "The Tao follows what is natural." (Tao Te Ching, Chapter 25)

Divine Providence.quote: "In all your ways acknowledge Him, and He will make straight your paths." (Proverbs 3:6)

Eternal Design.quote: "Before I formed you in the womb I knew you." (Jeremiah 1:5)

Divine Mission.quote: "I have come that they may have life, and have it to the full." (John 10:10)

Sacred Goals.quote: "The goal of life is the realization of Brahman." (Upanishads)

Divine Plan.quote: "For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord." (Jeremiah 29:11)

Heavenly Purpose.quote: "Everything that happens is according to Allah's wisdom." (Hadith)

Divine Intention.quote: "God's intent is to manifest His perfections through creation." (Ibn Arabi)

Sacred Direction.quote: "The dharma leads to the cessation of suffering." (Buddha)

Divine Destiny.quote: "In Him we were also chosen, having been predestined according to His purpose." (Ephesians 1:11)

Cosmic Intent.quote: "The universe is permeated by divine consciousness with purpose." (Sri Aurobindo)

Divine Aim.quote: "The aim of spiritual life is union with the Divine." (Ramakrishna)

Sacred Vision.quote: "Where there is no vision, the people perish." (Proverbs 29:18)

Divine Objective.quote: "The objective of creation is the manifestation of divine attributes." (Rumi)

Eternal Purpose.quote: "This is the purpose for which all things were created." (Bhagavad Gita 11:33)

Divine Wisdom.quote: "The wisdom from above is first pure, then peaceable." (James 3:17)

Sacred Path.quote: "There are many paths to the top of the mountain, but the view is always the same." (Chinese Proverb)

Divine Calling.quote: "Many are called, but few are chosen." (Matthew 22:14)

Divine Operation.quote: "It is God who works in you to will and to act." (Philippians 2:13)

Sacred Function.quote: "Everything in creation serves a divine function." (Zohar)

Divine Purpose.quote: "The purpose of human life is to serve and to show compassion." (Albert Schweitzer)
